extName.description: Extension name display as the title in extensions manager list.

extDescription.description: Short extension description display below the title in extensions manager list.

popup_title.description: Browser action button popup menu dialog title.

YDM_welcome_log.description: Console log welcome message immediately after the main script is injected on the page.

DanmakuContentPlaceholder.description: Placeholder at the Danmaku posting input textarea.

DanmakuURLPlaceholder.description: Placeholder at the Danmaku source URL input box.

Load.description: Button text to load Danmaku source URL.

Opacity.description: Danmaku setting type that corresponds to Danmaku transparency.
